SoundCloud

Product Manager

Berlin, Germany from 8/13/2014

SoundCloud is the world’s leading audio platform, scaling up with a rapidly growing global user base, and we’re looking for a Product Manager, Playback and Delivery to join our team in Berlin. Working with a world-class engineering team, you’ll be responsible for understanding and improving the time to playback and quality of playback for desktop and mobile SoundCloud applications though optimized streaming technologies.
